item.title: SG Finserve Joins MomentumNow Stocks Amid Strong Quarterly Financials
item.description: SG Finserve, a small-cap Non-Banking Financial Company (NBFC), has been added to the MomentumNow Stocks list as of 18 December 2025, reflecting its notable financial performance in the September 2025 quarter. The company’s recent quarterly results highlight significant growth across key metrics, positioning it as a compelling candidate for investors seeking momentum-driven opportunities in the NBFC sector. Time: 18 minutes ago

item.title: IFCI Forms Death Cross Signalling Potential Bearish Trend
item.description: IFCI Ltd., a key player in the finance sector, has recently formed a Death Cross, a technical pattern where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development often signals a shift towards a bearish trend, reflecting potential long-term weakness and a deterioration in price momentum. Time: 2 hours ago
